data.comment: It is reported that 10879 spectators are in attendance today.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 1, Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a Rostov throw-in in Khimki's half.
Throw-in Khimki.
Khimki to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
In the minute 5, Rostov needs to be cautious. Khimki have an attacking throw-in.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
Throw-in for Rostov in the half of Khimki.
In the minute 7, Free kick Rostov.
Can Rostov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
Rostov have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
In the minute 8, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Rostov push upfield but Vasiliy Kazarcev quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 10, Rostov's Kento Hashimoto breaks free at Rostov Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rostov-on-Don.
Khimki drives forward and Aleksandr Troshechkin gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 13, Rostov are coming forward and Denis Terentjev gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Khimki have a goal kick.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, In Rostov-on-Don a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
Rostov's Denis Terentjev gets in a shot on goal at Rostov Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 22, Reziuan Mirzov for Khimki has been booked by Vasiliy Kazarcev and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Rostov in the half of Khimki.
Corner awarded to Rostov.
In the minute 26, Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
At Rostov Arena, Roman Eremenko has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 28, Corner awarded to Rostov.
Khimki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Khimki in their own half.
Khimki advance rapidly upfield but Vasiliy Kazarcev blows for offside.
Rostov's Denis Terentjev is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 34, Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Khimki.
Mohamed Konate (Khimki) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Rostov goal kick.
In the minute 36, Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a throw-in for Rostov, close to Khimki's area.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards the away team a throw-in.
Mohamed Konate of Khimki gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 37, Vasiliy Kazarcev awards Rostov a goal kick.
Throw-in for Rostov at Rostov Arena.
Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 40, In Rostov-on-Don a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for Khimki at Rostov Arena.
In the minute 42, Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vladimir Obukhov (Rostov) has received a yellow card from Vasiliy Kazarcev.
Khimki to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
Mohamed Konate gets his shot on target but fails to score for Khimki.
In the minute 44, Khimki have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a Khimki throw-in in Rostov's half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Khimki have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Khimki in Rostov-on-Don.
Vladimir Obukhov (Rostov) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rostov-on-Don.
The first-half has come to a close in Rostov-on-Don.
The second half has started at Rostov Arena.
In the minute 46, Ball safe as Khimki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 46, Valeri Karpin is making the team's first substitution at Rostov Arena with Khoren Bayramyan replacing Vladimir Obukhov.
Valeri Karpin (Rostov) is making a second substitution, with Roman Tugarev replacing Danil Glebov.
The home team have replaced Denis Terentjev with Nikolay Poyarkov. This is the third substitution made today by Valeri Karpin.
Throw-in for Khimki in the half of Rostov.
Throw-in Rostov.
In the minute 47, Free kick Rostov.
Can Rostov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Dmitri Poloz for Rostov who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 51, Khimki have a goal kick.
Rostov drive upfield and Roman Tugarev gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Khimki defender.
Rostov are pushing forward but Khoren Bayramyan's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 54, Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
Rostov to take a throw-in in Khimki territory.
Rostov pushes forward through Dmitri Poloz, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 55, Dmitri Poloz for Rostov is back on the field again.
Free kick for Khimki in the half of Rostov.
Corner awarded to Khimki.
In the minute 56, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Khimki's Mohamed Konate misses with an attempt on goal.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards Rostov a goal kick.
In the minute 57, Ilya Kukharchuk is replacing Aleksandr Dolgov for the away team.
Throw-in for Rostov close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Rostov in the half of Khimki.
In the minute 60, Rostov are pushing forward but Roman Tugarev's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Khimki at Rostov Arena.
Can Khimki capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rostov's half?
In the minute 63, Roman Tugarev of Rostov gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Khimki at Rostov Arena.
Khimki have a goal kick.
In the minute 65, In Rostov-on-Don Khimki attack through Mohamed Konate. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rostov-on-Don.
Denis Hadzikadunic of Rostov smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 66, Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a throw-in for Rostov, close to Khimki's area.
Pavel Mamaev for Rostov drives towards goal at Rostov Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Khimki.
In the minute 71, He's off! Roman Eremenko is shown a red card.
Free kick Khimki.
Dmitri Tikhiy (Khimki) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Rostov in their own half.
The away team replace Aleksandr Troshechkin with Pavel Mogilevets.
Rostov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 78, Mohamed Konate gets his shot on target but fails to score for Khimki.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 81, Can Khimki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rostov's half?
Throw-in for Rostov at Rostov Arena.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 82, Vladimir Dyadyun is replacing Mohamed Konate for Khimki at Rostov Arena.
Rostov make their fourth substitution with Armin Gigovic replacing Pavel Mamaev.
Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Khimki drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Valeri Karpin is making the team's fifth substitution at Rostov Arena with Pontus Almqvist replacing Dmitri Poloz.
Ball safe as Khimki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Rostov in the half of Khimki.
Throw-in for Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Khimki at Rostov Arena.
Khimki's Evgeni Gapon has been booked in Rostov-on-Don.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards Rostov a goal kick.
Nikolay Poyarkov for Rostov drives towards goal at Rostov Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Rostov have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a Khimki throw-in in Rostov's half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Rostov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Khimki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards the home team a throw-in.
The match has come to a close in Rostov-on-Don. The final score is 0-2.
Goal! Khimki have got their heads in front thanks to a Reziuan Mirzov strike.
Goal! Khimki extend their lead to 0-2 through Brian Idowu.
